mapper.insert: INSERT INTO FOOD (FOOD_ID, FOOD_TYPE, FOOD_NAME ,FOOD_STOCK, FOOD_PRICE, FOOD_AVG_RATING, FOOD_PROTEIN, FOOD_FAT, FOOD_CARB) VALUES(FOOD_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{foodType},#{foodName}, #{foodStock}, #{foodPrice}, #{foodAvgRating}, #{foodProtein}, #{foodFat}, #{foodCarb})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM FOOD ORDER BY FOOD_ID DESC
SELECT * FROM (SELECT * FROM FOOD ORDER BY FOOD_ID DESC) WHERE ROWNUM = 1
mapper.update: UPDATE FOOD SET FOOD_STOCK = #{foodStock} WHERE FOOD_ID = #{foodId}
UPDATE FOOD SET FOOD_PRICE = ${foodPrice} WHERE FOOD_ID = #{foodId}
UPDATE FOOD SET FOOD_STOCK = FOOD_STOCK - #{preorderAmount} WHERE FOOD_ID = #{foodId}
UPDATE FOOD SET FOOD_AVG_RATING = #{foodAvgRating} WHERE FOOD_ID = #{foodId}
UPDATE FOOD SET FOOD_REVIEW_CNT = #{foodReviewCnt} WHERE FOOD_ID = #{foodId}
